channel.title: Otherish on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Adam Grant, Give and Take; on being "otherish"
item.description: A brief review of Give and Take, which I checked out from the Ann Arbor District Library. Grant writes about a number of people he calls givers, who are generous to a fault when sharing their time and expertise, even when there is not a sure bet that the generosity will be repaid. He contrasts this with the matchers, who always keep track of favors, and the takers who seek to exploit every circumstance.
